caption.p: Ultrastructural features of the osmophores in Anacardium humile at anthesis. (A) General view of the osmophores. (B) Epidermal cell showing the plastids containing oil droplets. (C) Plasmodesmata. Note also the presence of mitochondria, dictyosomes and endoplasmic reticulum. Di, dictyosomes; Mi, mitochondria; Nu, nucleus; Pd, plasmodesma; Pl, plastid; Re, endoplasmic reticulum; Va, vacuole.
